channel.title: About on Pinjun Zheng

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I am a Ph.D. student at King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST), majoring in Electrical and Computer Engineering (ECE). I currently work in the Information System Lab (ISL), under the supervision of Prof. Tareq Al-Naffouri. Before that, I got my Bachelor and Master degree at Harbin Institute of Technology (HIT). My research interests are terahertz localization and phase retrieval problem. Education profile Ph.D student, Electrical and Computer Engineering, KAUST, 2021-present.
